p: Methods: In ten intubated patients with hypoxemic and hypercapnia lung failure time constants (τ = R·C) were estimated from global and regional volume EIT signals obtained by Swisstom BB 2 (Swisstom, Switzerland). A first order exponential decay model was fitted to each regional and global impedance curve using MATLAB (The MathWorks, USA). The spread and mean of regional τ values is depicted in Fig. 68 and compared with the one τ value derived from the global signal.
